headline: A Great Utility Priced Under Fair Value: American Water Works
summary: American Water Works Company, Inc. is rated Buy with robust EPS growth, financial stability, & moderate undervaluation. Read more on AWK stock here.

headline: Assessing American Water Works Company (AWK) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: American Water Works Company (AWK) has drawn investor attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing a small gain over the past month but a decline over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for American Water Works Company. Looking beyond the recent pullback, American Water Works Company’s share price has slipped over the past quarter but sits at US$130.32 today. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 9.47% contrasts with weaker 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns...
